SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.workflow.impl

Class WorkflowServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.rebuild.AbstractIndexProducer
org.opencastproject.workflow.impl.WorkflowServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.rebuild.IndexProducer, org.opencastproject.job.api.JobProducer, org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowService
public class WorkflowServiceImpl extends org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.rebuild.AbstractIndexProducer implements org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowService, org.opencastproject.job.api.JobProducer
Implements WorkflowService with in-memory data structures to hold WorkflowOperations and WorkflowInstances. WorkflowOperationHandlers are looked up in the OSGi service registry based on the "workflow.operation" property. If the WorkflowOperationHandler's "workflow.operation" service registration property matches WorkflowOperation.getName(), then the factory returns a WorkflowOperationRunner to handle that operation. This allows for custom runners to be added or modified without affecting the workflow service itself.

    Modifier and Type

    Description
    static class 
    WorkflowServiceImpl.HandlerRegistration
    A tuple of a workflow operation handler and the name of the operation it handles

    • handleOperationException

      protected org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowInstance handleOperationException(org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowInstance workflow, org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationInstance currentOperation)
      Callback for workflow operations that were throwing an exception. This implementation assumes that the operation worker has already adjusted the current operation's state appropriately.
      Parameters:
      workflow - the workflow instance
      currentOperation - the current workflow operation
      Returns:
      the workflow instance

    • handleOperationResult

      protected org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowInstance handleOperationResult(org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowInstance workflow, org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowOperationResult result) throws org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowDatabaseException
      Callback for workflow operation handlers that executed and finished without exception. This implementation assumes that the operation worker has already adjusted the current operation's state appropriately.
      Parameters:
      workflow - the workflow instance
      result - the workflow operation result
      Returns:
      the workflow instance
      Throws:
      org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowDatabaseException - if updating the workflow fails
